Blog.post: Puffy orphans stick ur finger up ur nose c what cums c what goes GET REAL SHOOSH mittens kiss me im irish kiss me im danny (he needs some love too(preferably a woman)) thats just a taste of quotes we have much funnier ones i forgot my book of quotes at school p.s. go to my blog at www.skooootey.blogspot.com and my friend's at www.slooky.blogspot.com

Greetings!This is the new Book of Quotes blog. For people who don't know what the BQ is, its a book of funny quotes taken from teachers, students, little girl at choir, and Dr. Phil (he rocks). I hope you are not offended by any of them, (I don't think you will) and I'm sorry in advanced. I hope this will give you insight on some of the demented kids out in there world.

i cant believe its not otter omarosa (THATS SUCH A FUNNY NAME) i cant believe it is butter that must mean somethin different in canada (dr. phil quote) kwame nicle (say it over and over out loud) help my finger is stuck this is not a quote help im serious HHELP!help im not joking ooooooooowwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwy.i got it out and i bet u didnt even call for help.SELLOUTS. thats all for now. c ya. Will :-(

Her hair glistened in the rain like nose hair after a sneeze. His thoughts tumbled in his head, making and breaking like underpants in a dryer without Cling Free. She had a deep throaty, genuine laugh like that sound a dog makes before it throws up. His lawn was a light green like goose poop. The water pouring off the waterfall shimmered like a new born naked mole rat. Mhe model had a pouty look on her face, like she was constipated. Her hair was light brown brown like diarrhea. His grandma's stew had small chunks in it like vomit. The ballerina rose en pointe and extended one slender leg like a dog at a fire hydrant. It hurt the way the way your tongue hurts after you accidently staple it to the wall. The bikini model had a thin layer of water on her that shined like a greasy-foreheaded teenager. He was deeply in love. When she spoke he thought he heard bells as if she were a garbage truck backing up. His new car was white like puss. Her golden wedding ring glimmered like urine in the sun. Hope you liked them, Will :-)

i hope u can forgive us. but we will prolly have the new boq out for u by the end of summer/ beginning of the school year. well try to put a few quote from our ol book up here over the summer, just to keep yall occupied. hhhmmm, we will also have the boq 4 for yall next year itwill be our senior book (#1 woul be our freshman book #2 our sophmore ect.) i think theyll just keep getting better and better well g2g, Will {:-)

1.u have a bruise from slipping on the ice ont the sidewalk. 2.You realize that the moose ur hunting looks like ur mom. 3. When ur sawing down a pine tree u realize that its gonna topple over on u cuz ur on the wrong side 4. You think ur better than Americans when ur obviously wrong. 5. You smoke maple leaves instead of pot. 6.You try to make up for ur stupidity by making fun of Americans, only to find out that they dont take that crap, and ur being targeted by an American mob. part 2 tomarrow. Will

ok bq 3, as you know will come out hopefully the fall of this year. i'm so excited! book of quotes 4 will not have little girl at the store. i'm very sad. the reason is that we won't be seeing her anymore. i am moving up a choir. it was fun quoting her tho. her very first quote was " eww! don't buy that. it just screams UGLY!" good times, good times. yours truly, slooky McGriffin

This is my tribute to Canada: Oh canada! our home nd native land! ture patriot love in all thy sons command! w/ glowing hearts we see thee rise the true north strong and free! from far and wide oh canada we stand on guard fo thee! God Bless Canada!! if you click urlLink here (scroll way down) , you will see that canada has done us good by listing us in their google web search. america has followed and listed us also. to friendly neighbors to the north, great rock bands, and always giving us a place of refuge, Canada, on behalf of everyone, i thank you. Slooky McGriffin
" Get naked at popeyes!" " The sow took the measles and she died in the spring, yes she died in the spring " " eh. doncha no??" " i want me some boobahs!" das all i have for now! Slooky

oh dr. phil, you've done so much for us.you've helped us all just drop everything and get real.you are so awesome. you've given us the courage and pizazz to get a get real take on life. for all this, dr. Phil, i thank you. Slooky

so the book of quotes three will be out early this school year. we are sorry that we didnt get it out as soon as we told u we would. this year well try and crank out a 4th. and please bear w/ us. this is much harder than it sounds. sorta. n e ways. we will hope that u enjoy the new issue of boq. we have all the quotes colaborated we are just waiting for them to be published (ahem john). so thats the news fer now. Will p.s. im gonna look for crap to put on here (i.e., kwizes and what nots.)

this is my tribute to you lil girl. ellie, yur so materialisic. you made everyone feel good about themselves until you let them down behind their back. you always talk and make my job easier. the book of quotes will never be the same. from the first words i heard from yur mouth, "don't buy this, it screams ugly!" to the last ones, "maybe i'll see ya next year, bye!" i thank you. your amazing taste in sweaters and on going strength to push the limits, keep it up. judging ppl has never been the same. we will miss you. whether you know it or not. - Slooky

Even tho you keep secrets from us (like your tupee) and u being urlLink a black disc jockey you're still our favorite teacher to laugh at. when you get mad even tho you're serious we laugh. and your unobrow is a school mascot becuz its big and hairy (and most mascots are both) and when we learned that there was a Mrs. J we were creeped out. and soon we will be going to washington d.c. and u will have to deal with us for 3 days and in 8th grade we go to springfield. maybe this time well make ur head explode nomekiller
